ygData.subject: game enhancements maybe change for cleric quests? =)
ygData.msgSnippet: *General Enhancements* - If a user is killed due to self-inflicted spell or melee damage, experience will be lost. - When using a levitation spell, players are
ygData.messageBody:
*General Enhancements*

- If a user is killed due to self-inflicted spell or melee damage,
experience will be lost.
- When using a levitation spell, players are now vulnerable to attack from
both waterbound and landbound creatures.
- A number of enhancements have been made to balance the class specific
armor quests implemented last week.
- A bug was resolved which resulted in a quest reward not being given
approximately 1 percent of the time. - This has been fixed.

***************
Hopefully this means a decrease in spawn time!!! Not sure if game is back
up from patch yet... but if anyone confirms what "A number of enhancements
have been made to balance the class specific armor quests implemented last
week" means specifically, I would love to know!

~Siren
